Character Customization Celebration!

Join the Revelry December 20th through the 26th!

Summit Academy is returning with all the character customization from last time and MORE!

BRAND NEW this run are the advanced customization tokens to offer you unique ways to cast your favorite spells. Spells like Fire Spirit, Grasp of the Grave, Manna, and many others can be transformed into a variety of new offerings!

From body builds to artistic wing for Aelotoi customizations that will help set the stage for your continued creatives within this vast customizable world. Additional options for further refinement to your distinguished look can be achieved at Summit Academy. Take your pick from a variety of available unique options.

Define your character through unique personalizations available on the grounds of Summit Academy. Add flair to your arrivals and departures. Acquire signature moves. Incant with elegance and glamour. Swear in style! All of these can be your own extraordinary means of being a one-of-a-kind adventurer in Elanthia.

If enhancive items are more your style, be sure to visit Sylinar's Spire where his trusty attendants can both RECHARGE and INCREASE your enhancive items. Rumors are the Fusion Shaman will also be making an appearance!

...but wait, there’s more!

During the Summit Academy run, we will be selling two PRIVATE PROPERTIES as well as introducing ELANS, a way to purchase upgrades for your dwellings. These elans can only be used for private properties. During their debut, we will be offering property renamings, extra rooms, permanent ownership, and a few other goodies! Elans and the properties won’t go on sale until Friday, December 22nd until 9pm ET.

Evolve your character, and build your legacy in Elanthia.
